name: Slime Slayer (ETomb)
description:
A vacation on a lovely little island - what more could our hero want? There's little time to rest, however, for this island has more than a little bit of a slime problem!

A little student project I've spend time working on by myself for a few months.

Both an installer and a direct executable are available for download. 

Can't take credit for any of the art assets - I'm by-and-large a programmer, and thus all of the are either from the Unity or itch.io stores.

Some of the assets used:

* Gamekrazzy's Top Down Character

* Alex's 16x16 Outdoors Tileset

* OArielG's Simple Heart Health System (Unity Asset Store)

* Tiny World's Free Pixel Font - Thaleah (Unity Asset Store)

* ZOSMA's Fantasy Free GUI (Unity Asset Store)

* Porforever Pixel Potions (with Animation) (Unity Asset Store)

* Henry Software's Free Pixel Mob (Unity Asset Store)
